Title: WP7 Text-to-Speech Tool & Translation Library
Description: Windows Phone Text-to-Speech (wpTTS) produces speech from text strings. wpTTS also provides real-time translation between a select list of languages. (AppID required.)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Windows Phone Text-to-Speech (wpTTS) produces speech from text strings. wpTTS also provides real-time translation between a select list of languages. (AppID required.)

This code does work on Windows Phone 7.5 (Mango).
